skillTree.name: Brood Horror
skillTree.description: For the gaudier Warlord, Clan Moulder offers their most bloated Pox Rats as mounts to flail, crush, and savage a way through the enemy’s ranks.

skillTree.name: Tide of Death
skillTree.description: As soon as the Packmaster unleashes his beloved 'pets' upon the battlefield, their bloodthirsty hunt begins!

ui_effects.description: ➕ Summons a unit of Wolf Rats
➕ Summons a unit of Wolf Rats

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Tide of Death"

skillTree.name: Tide of Pox
skillTree.description: Summoned forth from filth-ridden sewers, disease-carrying amalgamations of rat and wolf cause pestilent havoc in the enemy’s ranks.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Summons a unit of Wolf Rats (Poison)
➕ Summons a unit of Wolf Rats (Poison)

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Tide of Pox"

skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Carrot & Stick
skillTree.description: A things-catcher and whip are not all that makes a Packmaster, for only the best have monster-goading down to a fine art.

effects.description:

	(Hero's army)

	(local province)

skillTree.name: Master Moulder
skillTree.description: Moulder’s most elite Packmasters are known as Master Moulders, fearless wranglers who excel at instilling greater control and discipline into their packs.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Hero's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +2% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +2 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units

Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Hero Catcher
skillTree.description: Show a Packmaster a hero and he will show you a tragedy.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Hero action cost: -10% for all actions
Wound action: Additional 20% chance of wounding target
Hero action cost: -20% for all actions
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target
Hero action cost: -30% for all actions

skillTree.name: Flesh Snatcher
skillTree.description: Catching lesser foes is hardly a challenge, but is undeniably useful to provide extra rations for the pack.

effects.description:
Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -3%
	(local enemy armies)
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -6%
	(local enemy armies)
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -12%
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Creature Musk
skillTree.description: This rat has been sprayed by some of the most horrible creatures ever to exist, and the very air around him intimidates enemy beasts.

effects.description:
Speed: -3% for War Beasts and Monsters
	(local region)

Weapon strength: -3% for War Beasts and Monsters
	(local region)

Speed: -6% for War Beasts and Monsters
	(local region)

Weapon strength: -6% for War Beasts and Monsters
	(local region)

Speed: -10% for War Beasts and Monsters
	(local region)

Weapon strength: -10% for War Beasts and Monsters
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Savage Rat
skillTree.description: Which do you fear more, the vicious monstrosities, or the rat that commands their respect and obedience?

effects.description:
Character's aura leadership effect: -1
	(enemy characters in region)

Bonus vs Large: -2
	(enemy characters in region)

Character's aura leadership effect: -2
	(enemy characters in region)

Bonus vs Large: -4
	(enemy characters in region)

Character's aura leadership effect: -3
	(enemy characters in region)

Bonus vs Large: -6
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Ratketeering
skillTree.description: Ah, spleen of rat ogre very rare-valuable, and difficult to extract! Will bargain-trade for warpstone.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +2%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.name: Tail Weapon
skillTree.description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Shock Collar
skillTree.description: Even the most vicious and impetuous monstrosities can be 'encouraged' to do one’s bidding with a quick jolt of Warpstone-generated electricity.

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +3%
	(Heroes in local region)

Magic item drop chance: +7%
	(Heroes in local region)

Magic item drop chance: +15%
	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Claws
backgroundSkills.description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Teeth
backgroundSkills.description: "When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."

backgroundSkills.name: Warpstone Hoarder
backgroundSkills.description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)
